history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: mults,pluspf,eqp_pluspf_com_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: mults,pluspf,eqp_pluspf_com_r,canonical_pluspf. qsimpl time: 1 use: mults,pluspf,eqp_pluspf_com_r,canonical_pluspf. qsimpl time: 1 use: mults,pluspf,eqp_pluspf_com_r,canonical_pluspf.

ctx: intros p q a Hp Hq Ha.
exceptions.tactic: apply eqp_pluspf_com_r with (cs:=cs) (p:=(mults a p)) (q:=(mults a q)) (r:=(mults a (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec p q))).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ffst := fst : list (Term A n) * list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) ssnd := snd : list (Term A n) * list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) ppair := pair : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) * list (Term A n) p, q : list (Term A n) a : Term A n Hp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Hq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q Ha : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a The term "eqA" has type "A -> A -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "A -> A -> A" (cannot unify "Prop" and "A").

ctx: intros p q a Hp Hq Ha.
exceptions.exn: The reference cs was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.exn: In environment l0 : forall A : Set, A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> + {eqA a b -> False}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p q r : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (l0 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec r p) (l0 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec r q) A : Set n : nat l : Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} p, q : list (Term A n) a : Term A n Ha : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> False H0 : olist (A:=A) ltM q H1 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) q H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM p H3 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p M1_min : forall x : mon n, ltM x (zero_mon n) -> False ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ltM x x -> False ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) A1_diff_A0 : eqA A1 A0 -> False eqA_ref : reflexive A eqA eqA_sym : symmetric A eqA eqA_trans : transitive A eqA plusA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c)) (plusA (plusA a b) c) plusA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a) plusA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c d) plusA_A0 : forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0) invA_plusA : forall a : A, eqA A0 (plusA a (invA a)) invA_eqA_comp : forall a b : A, eqA a b -> eqA (invA a) (invA b) minusA_def : forall a b : A, eqA (minusA a b) (plusA a (invA b)) multA_eqA_comp : forall a b c d : A, eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (multA a b) (multA c d) multA_assoc : forall a b c : A, eqA (multA a (multA b c)) (multA (multA a b) c) multA_com : forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) (multA b a) multA_dist_l : forall a b c : A, eqA (plusA (multA c a) (multA c b)) (multA c (plusA a b)) multA_A0_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A0 a) A0 multA_A1_l : forall a : A, eqA (multA A1 a) a divA_rew : forall (a b : A) (nZ1 nZ2 : eqA b A0 -> False), divA a b nZ1 = divA a b nZ2 divA_is_multA : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b) divA_eqA_comp : forall (a b c d : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZd : eqA d A0 -> False), eqA a c -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c d nZd) divA_multA_comp_r : forall (a b c : A) (nZc : eqA c A0 -> False), eqA (divA (multA a b) c nZc) (multA (divA a c nZc) b) divA_invA_r : forall (a b : A) (nZb : eqA b A0 -> False) (nZib : eqA (invA b) A0 -> False), eqA (divA a (invA b) nZib) (invA (divA a b nZb)) Unable to unify "olist ?M5548 (pluspf ?M5543 ?M5545 ?M5546 ?M5549 ?M5551 ?M5552) /\\ nZterm ?M5543 ?M5544 (pluspf ?M5543 ?M5545 ?M5546 ctx: intros p q a Hp Hq Ha.
exceptions.exn: The reference cs was not found in the current environment.

original: intros p q a Hp Hq Ha. apply eqp_pluspf_com_r with (cs:=cs) (p:=(mults a p)) (q:=(mults a q)) (r:=(mults a (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec p q))). apply canonical_pluspf with (cs:=cs); auto. apply canonical_pluspf; auto. apply canonical_pluspf with (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec); auto. apply canonical_pluspf with (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec); auto. apply eqp_pluspf_com_r with (cs:=cs); auto.
